snippet.title: Zorbus - Gameplay 3 (hero finds a sentient, talking weapon)
snippet.description: Some gameplay of Zorbus, which is a traditional, fantasy-themed, turn-based, roleplaying roguelike game. You can get it free from www.zorbus.net. In this video our hero finds a sentient, talking weapon. Also shows the new, optional creature wiggle effect.
